title: Gossip: McNamara on Stoke radar
title_page: Gossip: McNamara on Stoke radar - BBC Sport
maintext:
Sunderland and QPR are interested in Celtic winger Luis Palma, who is also drawing the eye of Stoke City and Swansea City. (Football Insider, external)
Millwall defender Dan McNamara is a subject of interest for Stoke, with the 26-year-old out of favour at the Den. (The72, external)
